column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday November 17 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions between Georgetown Rd and Leestown Rd due to a serious collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd:
column4: The outer loop is being diverted to Georgetown Rd.  The inner loop is being diverted to Leestown Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd:
column4: UPDATE 10:32 p.m. - New Circle Rd is back open in both directions.
The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet. Also see the KYTC Twitter page.
